problem: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC边上,DE∥BC,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{4}{5},DE=8,则BC等于()
comment: 本题考查相似三角形的判定和性质,解答本题的关键是明确题意,找出所求问题需要的条件,利用三角形相似的知识解答．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on the sides of AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, if \frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{N_0}{N_1}, DE = N_2, then BC is equal to ()
